thread.title: 2018 Chevrolet Equinox first drive: A strong third act
thread.title_full: 2018 Chevrolet Equinox first drive: A strong third act

author: Brandon Turkus (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: 2018 Chevrolet Equinox first drive: A strong third act
text: The Chevrolet Equinox's revitalization has been long overdue. Compact crossovers are all the rage in America's driveways and Chevy's entry had been out of touch for a few years. The old model could trace its roots back to George W. Bush's first term. Despite some updates, its thirsty engines, its chintzy interiors, and its dearth of advanced...
